text:
What’s your favorite Easter meal, snack or family tradition food?? Post them below!
                                      







 
                                                  Jo VanderPol
                                                  


                                                 For Easter brunch our tradition is Quiche Lorraine and a pitcher of Bloody Marys.

As the group grows, we have to review older rules to make sure they best fit the current group.
                                     



                                      Going forward we would like all post shared to have all ingredients AND instructions on how it was made. We will still not allow links in the main post but they are welcome in the comments.
                                     



                                      Reasons behind this are as follows; we are seeing many shared post with just ingredients and no recipes or how to, this can be frustrating to other members when not clear and you as the post…

Hi all,
                                     

                                      We want to make sure that everyone know the rules for posting.  I know the list is long, but we have found that this list gives you the best chance to get positive feedback and help.  It also allows for the best interactions.
                                     

 
                                                  Nella Hanson
                                                  

                                                        Author
                                                       
 


                                                 16.	Medical Conditions that require special diets should be discussed with medical professionals. Please take any suggestions you have to them before changing your diet if you have a specific restriction or dietary need.
                                                

                                                 17.	No post shaming will be al…
                                                 
                                                  See more

PSA:  PLEASE DO NOT message an admin/moderator asking why your post isn’t approved yet- why is it taking so long- or anything along those lines.
                                     



                                      We have 4.1 million members- that’s a lot of posts in pending- we get to it when we get to it- please be patient- the most we have ever taken to approve/decline posts is a mere hours. Which given the size of this page- is not very long.
                                     



                                      ALSO- please DO NOT depend on a page for time sensitive requests for dinner in 2 hrs…
                                      
                                       See more

Please remember you do not know someone else's situation or where they received something from. Some members like certain foods, others may have received them from a food bank or as a donation. In many case people may need that food item to just make it till the next payday or meal.
                                     

                                      When you have a choice to be mean or be kind, please be kind.
                                     

 
                                                  Krystal Vance
                                                  


                                                 A LOT of people need to reread this!

MEMBERS:  REMINDER ON SEVERAL THINGS:
                                      















                                      - NO FOOD PALS. Not limited to- but includes- Christmas cards with recipes- I mail you food you mail me food- pen pals- ETC… OF ANY SORT-  this will result in an automatic BAN. We have honest members- and not so honest members—- and with 4.1 million members- we don’t know who’s who. So we will keep EVERYONE HONEST.
                                     



                                      —-we DO NOT ALLOW ibotta posts. This is a world wide page and the “free meals” are not worldwide.  ALSO- …
                                      
                                       See more
                                      


 
                                                  Nella Hanson
                                                  


                                                 Please note that at times we may try post that are on this list to see how the group responds to them.
                                                



                                                 Change is the constant in a large group. If something works long term we may update this list.

Reminder
                                      












                                      We do NOT allow any post OR comments where consuming alcohol or alcoholic based beverages is the option- or main focus.
                                     



                                      We are a CHEAP MEALS PAGE-  not an alcohol beverage page.  …
                                      
                                       See more

PLEASE READ!
                                     



                                      - If your post was declined, read the ENTIRE decline notice it will say on there what or why it was declined.  Please review the announcements for posting guidelines and rules.
                                     



                                      - When looking for your post to come through keep in mind that it may take a while, but we are doing our best to approve them as quickly as possible. We do all have lives outside of Facebook. Sending through multiple posts asking where your post is or sending in a duplicate post, will o…

                                               Mine says for wording yet I said yes, adding some chicken would make this amazing it was a suggestion the person said to do so, I tried changing my comment 15 different time even my last comment was declined can I ask what “word” I am using that keeps getting declined?

ANNOUNCEMENT REGARDING TODDLER/CHILD FOOD PLATES
                                      




                                      ALL mommy shaming/ unsolicited parenting advice will from here on out result in a BLOCK and REMOVAL from this group
                                      


                                      This is a food page and children need to eat too. No talk of cutting grapes/food safety/nutrition/etc will be allowed. For all of that, members need to consult with their family doctors and pediatricians as the safety of children is a case by case basis. On that note, if your child has dietary restrictions, t…
